post:
**Maximum Virtual Private Servers LLC is a Washington State registered LLC. We have been in business since February 2013.**

Quick AUP: We do not allow camfrog, virtual currency mining, TOR exit nodes. [Full AUP here.](http://maximumvps.net/clients/aup.php)

Cyber Monday Special !! Quantity Limited !

**<del>CM-KVM512 $4/m</del> SOLD OUT!**

* 4 Core
* 512 MB RAM
* 125 GB HDD
* 1 TB Traffic
* 1 Gbps Port
* 4 IPv4 address
* IPv6 on request

Need more IPv4 addresses, traffic, HDD space or CPU cores? Contact us via PM!

**Operating systems**

Our KVM64-256 plans are low-RAM and only support a few operating systems, such as:

* Debian 6 (manually upgradeable to Debian 7)
* DSL
* Tiny Core
* Alpine
* Austrumi

Others are available as well, but install and test at your own risk. 

**Location:** Our colocated owned nodes are located at [Quadranet](http://quadranet.com/) (_not_ via ColoCrossing) at their Los Angeles, California datacenter. Their network provides native IPv6 connectivity (no tunnelling), and great connectivity to Asia and Australia. Providers include nLayer, Tiscali/Inteliquent, PCCW/BTN, Equinix LAIIX Any2Exchange, Host.net, HiNet Taiwan, and ChinaUnicom Direct.

**Our current node specifications:** Dual L5420, 16GB RAM, 4 x 1TB WD RE drives, Adaptec 4305 RAID with BBU

**Questions?** E-mail us at support[at]maximumvps.net
